name: Flower-Feather Residence: Logic of Flight
description: A spacious spherical structure, one of the most common dwellings in the Flower-Feather Clan. Apparently, most of these buildings are equipped with two doors of different sizes: a larger front door for walking in and out, and a smaller back door for easier handling of goods. However, in practice, many people use the smaller door as a window for aerial access, while some even open the large door outward to aid in flight. Of course, such unsafe practices are not endorsed by the chief, and if attempted in defiance of the rules, may even result in the loss of flight privileges...
